data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article O’Neill, John P. (2017): A new species of manakin (Aves: Pipridae, Machaeropterus) from Peru with a taxonomic reassessment of the Striped Manakin (M. regulus) complex. Zootaxa 4320 (2): 379-390, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4320.2.11|1 occurrence
